reason: Hohoho, hyperpowerzone! Another excellent question from you! Snow, my dear friend, comes from the clouds high above, where tiny water droplets freeze together and fall gently to the Earth, making everything look so wonderfully sparkly! Still nice, you are! nice

history.reason: the elves tell me that hyperpowerzone has wished for me this christmas! while i certainly will be going to there house no matter what, i must say this is a rather naughty wish. wishing to keep me away from everyone else, and keep me just for  your self! why thats the most naughty of wishes.

history.wish: santa, I wish for an Xbox
history.reason: the elves tell me that hyperpowerzone has wished for an xbox! this is a rather nice request indeed, since it follows well with the christmas spirit! i will leave you on the nice list for this one for sure.
